name: Misskey Channel
description: Misskey Streaming API channel for OpenClaw, using misskey-llm-cli (what) binary

cliBinary.description: Path to the 'what' CLI binary. If omitted, searches PATH.

mentionOnly.description: If true, only process messages that mention the bot user.

adminUsers.description: List of usernames with admin privileges (e.g. can use admin-only commands).
